DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Apply the effects of you #yInvocation and all #yAttunements based on your #yConcentration.
Amplify your next #yCast for each level of concentration you have.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
#yInvoking a #yComponent changes your current invocation to be that component
#yAttuning a #yComponent adds it to an empty slot if one exists
